name: Diabetes Run
description:
A runner game advocate doing exercise and eating a balanced diet to maintain a normal blood sugar level.It provides a fun way to keep track of your daily blood sugar levels.Be sure to keep track of your glucose meter keeping it from going too high or too low.

The Game is also available also on Play Store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TeamRapid.DiabeticRun
